resources.string: Set in a fictional country called Daeho, it is about the love and growth of young mages as they overcome their twisted fates due to a forbidden magic spell known as the "alchemy of souls", which allows souls to switch bodies.
A high school becomes ground zero for a zombie virus outbreak. Trapped students must fight their way out or turn into one of the rabid infected.
In disguise as her friend, Ha-ri shows up to a blind date to scare him away. But plans go awry when he turns out to be her CEO - and makes a proposal.

The absolute top secret love story of a chaebol heiress who made an emergency landing in North Korea because of a paragliding accident and a North Korean special officer who falls in love with her and who is hiding and protecting her.
This drama tells of the love story that develops between a surgeon and a special forces officer.
In his quest for a bride to break his immortal curse, Dokkaebi, a 939-year-old guardian of souls, meets a grim reaper and a sprightly student with a tragic past.
A big-city dentist opens up a practice in a close-knit seaside village, home to a charming jack-of-all-trades who is her polar opposite in every way.
When a grim incident occurs at their prestigious school, justice through law is put to a test by a tough law professor and his ambitious students.

Renowned young architect Choi Seung-hyo runs the atelier "In." Bae Seok-ryu, his childhood friend, rejoins his life after quitting her corporate job, resurfacing memories he would rather forget from their peculiar childhood bond.

Ha-jin travels 1000 years back in time and lands in the era of Goryeo Dynasty as a young girl named Hae-soo. She, now trapped in another body, becomes involved in a power struggle against various vicious contenders to the throne.

A story that depicts the lives of people at Jongno Yulje Medical Center. The professors, ob/gyn residents, and the friendships between these people are told, including first year ob/gyn resident Oh Yi-Young.

A teenage outcast is uprooted from his residence and forced to confront terrifying monsters intent on eradicating humanity. As he battles against impossible odds, he discovers the strength to fight for survival and to protect others.

A romance unfolds between a lawyer and a famous actress whose life falls apart after a scandal. She pretends to be someone else to become the lawyer secretary and join a drama written by a well-known writer.

After being bullied and discriminated because of her ugly looks, a high school girl transforms herself into a gorgeous "goddess" and quickly rises to fame after mastering the art of makeup via online tutorial videos.

"Sparkling Watermelon" will tell the story of a boy living a double life between a model student and a band member who gets to time slip and meets his 18-year-old father. The two will build friendships there.
During a visit to his motherland, a Korean-Italian Mafia lawyer gives an unrivaled conglomerate a taste of its own medicine with a side of justice.
In Jeju, the story of a spirited girl and a steadfast boy blossoms into a lifelong tale of setbacks and triumphs, proving love endures across time.
Follows the budding romance between a perfect but narcissistic second-generation heir and his capable assistant.
